    Instances of this class represent Application Server nodes that do not participate in the hearbeats and are assumed to always be alive.

    NodeRegisterImpl
    This is the placeholder for maintening information about alive nodes and the relation between a Call-Id and its attributed node.
    NodeRegisterImpl.BindingAddressCorrectnessSocketFactory  
    NullServerNode
    If your algorthm return an instance of this class the load balancer will not forward the request anywhere.

    Persistent Consistent Hash algorithm - see http://docs.google.com/present/view?

    RouteHeaderHints  
    RouterImpl Deprecated
    This custom implementation is not used anymore in the new sip balancer version
    SIPBalancerForwarder
    A transaction stateful UDP Forwarder that listens at a port and forwards to multiple outbound addresses.
    SIPBalancerValveProcessor  
    SIPNode
    Class holding information about a node such as hostname, ip address, port and transports supported.
    StatisticObject  
    UDPPacketForwarder  
    WorstCaseUdpTestAffinityAlgorithm
    This algorthim will send each new transaction to a new node triggering all replication corner cases
